channel.title: ELP Television
channel.itunes:subtitle: Ashtabula-area Shows
channel.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
channel.itunes:summary: Online television network offering public domain and Creative Commons-licensed video content from the Internet Archive in addition to Ashtabula-area produced shows.
channel.description: Online television network offering public domain and Creative Commons-licensed video content from the Internet Archive in addition to Ashtabula-area produced shows.

item.title: A Trip To The Planets
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: A Trip To The Planets

item.title: Soviet Union: Changing Times
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Soviet Union: Changing Times
item.itunes:summary: An academic/cultural film looking at the Soviet Union shortly before its collapse. Look and learn from this as we face treacherous times in the United States of America.
item.description:
An academic/cultural film looking at the Soviet Union shortly before its collapse. Look and learn from this as we face treacherous times in the United States of America.

item.title: Spinning Levers
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Spinning Levers
item.itunes:summary: This short film by the Jam Handy Organization released during the Great Depression provides some educational material about levers, car transmissions, and how that all works for us.
item.description:
This short film by the Jam Handy Organization released during the Great Depression provides some educational material about levers, car transmissions, and how that all works for us.

item.title: Partial Operations Resumption
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Partial Operations Resumption
item.itunes:summary: As the war drags on in Ukraine we bring a partial resumption of operations along with a new video. This is a training film from World War II about radio maintenance.
